brooklyn.util.mutex
[Java] Class SemaphoreForTasks

java.lang.Object
  java.util.concurrent.Semaphore
      brooklyn.util.mutex.SemaphoreWithOwners
          brooklyn.util.mutex.SemaphoreForTasks

public class SemaphoreForTasks
extends SemaphoreWithOwners

A subclass of SemaphoreWithOwners which additionally sets Task blocking information.

TODO As tasks are distributed this should support distribution across the management context.
